author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:
With the merging of  #27823 , #27941 and https://github.com/cms-data/SimTracker-SiStripDigitizer/pull/1 we have now all the ingredients to be able to test (on selected dedicated workflows) the activation of the SiStrip APV dynamic gain simulation in 2016 MC.
This PR:
   * adds 3 TTbar workflow with the feature activated in the digitizer: `1325.6` (TTbar 2016, noPU), `25202.1` (TTbar + PU, std. mixing) and `250202.2` (TTbar + PU, premixing). 
   * slightly changes the `SiStripApvSimulationParametersESProducer` in order to be able to cope with the absence of parameters for the EndCaps. 

#### PR validation:
Code changes passes dedicated testing via:
```
 runTheMatrix.py -l 1325.6 ,25202.1,250202.2 -t 4 -j 8 --ibeos --command='-n 200'
```
The outcome has been used to check the effect of the simulation, a couple of plots is attached:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/65147264-09373d80-da1e-11e9-82d3-9811e324ac48.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/65147282-12c0a580-da1e-11e9-9f59-3dfcfa5451e5.png)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

This PR is not a backport.
title: Introduce Special RelVals for SiStrip APV dynamic gain simulation
